page.title: 04MOTORWAY (M66)
page.content: Wash Lane Residents Action Committee (WLRAC) held a meeting to review their position.Mr.William Rodgers commented,"We are not convinced that the Motorway will solve the problem of heavy lorries using Wash Lane,but we have been continually pleaded by the WLRAC that the motorway will help the residents' traffic problem. Mr.Rodgers was the official opener of the 23 million pound,6 miles northern half of the M66.Work on this road had started in 1975 although bad weather delayed the opening by 6 months.Councillor Spurr the deputy major of Bury said,"Bury is now the hub of the system with a consequent improvment in the life of the community.
